title: Ep. 31: 'The Watch'
description:
Chris and Andy discuss this week's episode of 'Girls' (8:00), examine the 'Batman v. Superman' debacle (33:00), and pay tribute to Garry Shandling (42:00).
      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
